title: House For Rent- Bellevue
posting_body: Don't miss this luxury 4 bedroom, 2.5 bath home on half acre professionally landscaped lot.
Located in a desirable Bellevue neighborhood, Bellevue school district.
Less than 8 minutes from I-405, I-90 &Hwy 520, Microsoft,downtown Bellevue, a few blocks from Glendale golf course.

Main floor highlights include vaulted ceilings; fireplaces in living room, family room, and Master; chef kitchen with slab granite counters; walk in pantry and office with French doors on the main floor.
The upstairs includes 3 spacious bedrooms as well as a large master suite with gas fireplace, seating area, double sinks, jetted tub.
This home includes air conditioning, security, sprinkler systems and 3 car garage.
It's a perfect move-in ready house for your family!
Rent negotiable based on lease date and terms
Rent price is negotiable (based on terms), Tenant responsible for Maintenace of Landscaping/Lawns, Utilities, Water and Sewage, and Trash /Recycle services,
